title: Using Containerized Software on HPC for Bioinformatics
text:

Make data directory
Download toy data files into directory



Terminal

# set directory to store alignments in
alignments_dir="data/alignments"
# create alignments directory
mkdir -p "${alignments_dir}"

# download BAM and index
wget \
  -P "${alignments_dir}" \
  https://github.com/trev-f/hpc-containers-crash-course/raw/refs/heads/main/data/alignments/wt_antiflag_ip1_rep1.bam

title: HPC Containers Crash Course
text:
This is the home page for a 1-2 hour mini workshop that will provide a hands-on crash course on utilizing Apptainer to run software containers on UTK’s ISAAC-NG HPC.
